text: , also known as JOGMEC,JOGMEC is an acronym. JOGMEC stands for "Japan Oil, Gas and MEtals National Corporation". is an Independent Administrative Institution which was created by the Japanese government in 2004.JOGMEC, About us, history ; retrieved 2012-6-1. ==History== In 2004, JOGMEC was established by the Law Concerning the Japan Oil, Gas and Metals National Corporation .Japan Oil, Gas and Metals National Corporation (JOGMEC), About us, overview ; retrieved 2012-6-1. JOGMEC was created when the Japan National Oil Corporation (JNOC) merged with the former Metal Mining Agency of Japan (MMAJ). Rare metal stockpiles are managed by JOGMEC.National Research Council (US). (2008). Minerals, Critical Minerals, and the U.S. Economy, p. 186. In March 2013 JOGMEC successfully extracted methane hydrate from seabed for the first time in the world. ==Related pages== * List of Independent Administrative Institutes in Japan ==References== ==Other websites== * JOGMEC website Category:Independent Administrative Institutions of Japan
title: Japan Oil, Gas and Metals National Corporation
